comments.body: I wanted to read these also using the message reader but for some reason pa.read_schema(self_reader.read_next_message()) didn't work.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +361,365 @@    def __init__(self, stream):
        import pyarrow as pa
        self._schema1 = pa.read_schema(stream)
        self._schema2 = pa.read_schema(stream)
        self._reader = pa.MessageReader.open_stream(stream)
